text: Pearl Alice Marsh worked as Senior Professional Staff for Africa on the House Committee on Foreign Affairs. She was the first African-American woman to receive a doctorate degree in Political Science from the University of California, Berkeley. She served as Director of U.S. Policy and Global Health at the ONE Campaign. ==References== Category:Date of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Foreign relations of the United States Category:University of California, Berkeley alumni Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Pearl Alice Marsh
